author: Yeremia Patuan

text:
I remember playing Legaia 2 off a whim. Never played the first one and probably don't plan to--I just love this one too much. If it was supposed to be a continuation, it never felt like it was. In fact, it probably should have just been a stand alone game so people can stop comparing it to the first one that has almost nothing to do with it.

It's the kind of annoying thing people do with Xenogears and Xenosaga or even Xenoblade. They hardly relate to each other...

BTW, love this song.
author: IndigoSnake
